---
title: "SummaryStatsBy Test"
author: "Derek Chiu"
date: "November 18, 2015"
output: word_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE}
library(bccaEndometrial)
library(ECClocal)
library(biostatUtil)
mtcars$vs <- as.factor(mtcars$vs); mtcars$am <- as.factor(mtcars$am)
cat(SummaryStatsBy(data = mtcars, by1 = "cyl", by2 = "gear", var.names = c("mpg", "qsec")))
```

White Space

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
cat(SummaryStatsBy(data = mtcars, by1 = "cyl", by2 = "gear", var.names = c("mpg")))
```

White Space

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
cat(SummaryStatsBy(data = mtcars, by1 = "cyl", by2 = "gear", var.names = c("mpg", "vs", "qsec", "am")))
```

White Space

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
cat(SummaryStatsBy(data = mtcars, by1 = "cyl", by2 = "gear", var.names = c("vs", "qsec")))
```
